docs.lead_paragraph: There is an advertisement in this number of our paper, to which we wish to call your special attention. We do so, not because we are paid for doing it--for the proprietor has not so much as requested us to do so--but from the fact that we sincerely believe it deeply interests you and your children to know what is there comunicated.

headline.main: GENERAL CITY NEWS; Arrivals in the City.

docs.lead_paragraph: A THRILLING INCIDENT.--On Saturday afternoon, as the Staten Island ferry-boat Southfield was on her down trip at 5 o'clock, and when about one mile below Government's Island, a little boy, aged about three years, son of Mr. J.H. WATSON, who resides at No. 87 First-place, Brooklyn, fell overboard from the upper deck.

headline.main: FROM NORTHERN MISSOURI.; ACCOUNT OF AN ENGAGEMENT BETWEEN COL. MCNEIL'S MEN AND THE REBELS, AT FULTON, BY ONE OF THE SOLDIERS.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: CIVIL WAR (THE WAR BETWEEN THE STATES)

docs.snippet: I closed my last letter to the TIMES on the 5th, at a point some 45 miles from Booneville, since which time we have reached the Mecca of our pilgrimage--Springfield.

headline.main: THE WAR IN MISSOURI.; OUR SPRINGFIELD CORRESPONDENCE. ARRIVAL OF GEN. LYON'S COMMAND--INCIDENTS OF THE MARCH FROM BOONEVILLE--NOTES OF THE BATTLE OF CARTHAGE, ETC.

docs.lead_paragraph: I closed my last letter to the TIMES on the 5th, at a point some 45 miles from Booneville, since which time we have reached the Mecca of our pilgrimage--Springfield.

docs.snippet: Yesterday was a glorious day for the National arms, and one in which Rebellion was taught a lesson which it will not soon forget, though at the expense of a sad loss of life.
docs.lead_paragraph: Yesterday was a glorious day for the National arms, and one in which Rebellion was taught a lesson which it will not soon forget, though at the expense of a sad loss of life.
